actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to ensure the protection of state water interests.

summary.text: State Water Protection Act of 1981 - Prohibits: (1) the United States from using water from any State in an energy project unless the water is obtained pursuant to State law; and (2) a grantee acquiring rights-of-way across Federal land for energy projects from using water other than pursuant to State law. Defines "energy project" to mean the interstate development or transportation of energy material or products including coal pipeline carriers.

titles.title: A bill to ensure the protection of state water interests.
